name: Abduction
description:
Abduction is a singleplayer psychological horror experience, similar to Slender: The Eight Pages. When unexpected visitors arrive in the middle of the night, you must defend your farm in order to take back your land.

Use your flashlight to ward off enemies or stay in the shadows to avoid confrontation. Listen to your surroundings to detect danger and unveil alien landmarks. Discover the source of your enemies power and put an end to their invasion.


Features:


  • Investigate distant noises
  • Avoid being spotted
  • Discover other-worldly technologies
  • Break the seemingly endless cycle



EPILEPSY WARNING
